title: Gold 4 team looking for top, adc and jungle mains
body:
I AM LOOKING FORa top main and an adc main who are keen to commit to my team. The players we have at the moment are nice and have good attitudes. We communicate a lot and we spend time to make team comps and organize picks and bans. I wish to make this team legit as in be in diamond for r5. At the moment we have a plat 1, diamond 5, plat 5 and a plat 4. In saying this players must be at least PLAT LEVEL IN RANK.

Also I would require players who do apply to have had previous rank 5 experience. At least a gold level team that they have played on. Please you must be available at 8pm on weekdays, weekends are a bit hard to pin point exactly when we will play but if you communicate to me when you think you will be home that would HELP. You must be 18+ ( this is because I am done with dealing with trolls).

We are a serious team, I am easy going and if people upset you I do deal with it. You won't be raged at, you will find we are a group of boys who are good mates even though most of us met over THE NET.

Please have skype and add me my ign is skt1 DemonSlayer

replies.body: I have added you im going out now so ill play later tonight if you accept me into your ranked 5s
